text: The men's 200 metres event at the 2001 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Amsterdam, Netherlands, at Olympisch Stadion on 14 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Marcin Jędrusiński ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Łukasz Chyła ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Mark Howard ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 14 July Wind: 0.1m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
